description: Weizman, Ezer, 1924-2005 -- Photographs; Laʼu, Y. M. (Yiśraʼel Meʼir) -- Photographs
label: The Chief Rabbinate of Israel decided in 1951 that the Feast of the 10th of Tevet - which marks the destruction of the First temple in the year 586 BCE - will also mark the deaths of 6 million Jews in the Nazi Holocaust.
